name: 999 (itch)
description:
Score 999 as fast as you can !

Rules:

- The number you're carying with you is the score multiplier.

- If you pick up a cross before it vanishes, you will gain +1 score multi.

- If you let it go, you will loose -2 score multi.

- If you pick up a circle before it vanishes, you will score your current score multi. 

- If you let it go, you will loose your current score multi.

Moves:

- WASD to move

- SHIFT to run (at the cost of losing score over time)

- SPACE to jump (at the cost of 1 score multi)

Tips:

- Try to stack and maintain score multiplier as best as you can.

- It's worth more jumping at a cross than letting it go.

- Once you have a decent score multi, run (SHIFT) cost won't matter anymore.

- Press ENTER on GG Screen to play again.
